verses.text: \w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Babylon \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8432"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* \f + \fr 137:2 \ft Or poplars\f* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w hung|strong="H8518"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w captors|strong="H7617"\w* \w requested|strong="H7592"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*; \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w tormentors|strong="H8437"\w* \w demanded|strong="H7592"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*: “\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.”

How can \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5236"\w* land?

If I \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* you, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, may \w my|strong="H7911"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* cease \w to|strong="H3389"\w* function.

\w May|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w cling|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w roof|strong="H2441"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w* if \w I|strong="H5921"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, if \w I|strong="H5921"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w exalt|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* greatest \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*!

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Edom \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w fell|strong="H6168"\w*: “Destroy \w it|strong="H5704"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3117"\w* said, “tear \w it|strong="H5704"\w* down \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w its|strong="H5704"\w* \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w*!”

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Babylon, doomed \w to|strong="H1323"\w* destruction, blessed \w is|strong="H7703"\w* \w he|strong="H1576"\w* \w who|strong="H1323"\w* \w repays|strong="H7999"\w* \w you|strong="H1580"\w* \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w you|strong="H1580"\w* \w have|strong="H1323"\w* \w done|strong="H1580"\w* \w to|strong="H1323"\w* us.

Blessed is \w he|strong="H5553"\w* who seizes \w your|strong="H5310"\w* \w infants|strong="H5768"\w* \w and|strong="H5768"\w* \w dashes|strong="H5310"\w* \w them|strong="H5310"\w* against \w the|strong="H5310"\w* \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*.
